content: A `RangeCalendar` allows users to select a date range. It can be controlled (`value`, `onChange`) or uncontrolled (`defaultValue`). It uses objects from `@internationalized/date`.

You can restrict the selectable range with `minValue` and `maxValue`. The `isDateUnavailable` prop can disable specific dates. `allowsNonContiguousRanges` can be used to select a range over unavailable dates.
Key features include `showMonthAndYearPickers`, `visibleMonths`, and international calendar support, similar to the standard Calendar component.
RangeCalendar is fully accessible, with keyboard navigation for selecting ranges and localized screen reader announcements.
